text: Pen man awl Atens anɨb ak, binbɨ ogɨnap, takaw nop ak kɨdek gɨl, Jisas nop gos lɨnɨgɨlak. Binbɨ anɨb okok nɨm, bɨ olap yɨb nop ak Diyonisiyus. Ne bɨ kaunsol kay Aleyopagus kɨli anɨb ak nɨb olap. Bin olap yɨb ne Damalis, ne Jisas nop gos lɨnɨgɨlak. Pen binɨb yokɨp ogɨnap sek abe Jisas nop gos lɨnɨgɨlak.
